p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Control your computer from your phone. Built in 15 minutes.
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92: Launch the Display App on your computer, scan the QR code with your phone, and play with the color of your screen. **Important** If you copy this project, you must change the `Get Phone Controller URL` brick to provide the URL of your own app! (details are in the documentation of that brick) Demonstrated Concepts ---------- Shows how a shared object can be updated and read from different devices Building your own ---------- Simply follow the the tutorial
